data.eml:eml: Two new orthoclad species from Colombian Andes (Diptera: Chironomidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Ospina-Torres, Rodulfo, Mey, Wolfram, Jaime-Murcia, Patricia (2018): Two new orthoclad species from Colombian Andes (Diptera: Chironomidae). Zootaxa 4472 (2): 385-392, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4472.2.11
